matt - May 11, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 4.0.0

Incredible attention to detail, massive amount of icons, and a cool-looking bug-droid as well.... All for .99 cents!!

Diamond - February 2, 2012 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 2.4.9
CRYSTAL HD WAllPAPERS
Some of the wallpapers shown above with this theme are not all included. *THE BLACK ONE WITH THE GREEN STRIPE IS NO WHERE TO BE FOUND*.It was because of that wallpaper that I purchased this theme. I'M SO DISPLEASED BY THIS *I'VE EVEN SENT SEVERAL EMAILS TO THE DEVELOPER WITH THE IMAGE ATTACHED I'VE GOTTEN NO REPONSE I WOULD REALLY LIKE A REFUND BECAUSE OF THE FALSE AVERTISING SHOWN ABOVE* *EVERYONE PLEASE BECAREFULL OF WHAT U PURCHASE IN THE MARKET*

Rafael - March 31, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.4.9
Waste of moneyu
I like some of the backgrounds, but the Icons are just re used from other ADW themes with a "HD"/modern background to them, for 1$ i would have expected more.
